data.meanings: to pay the blood money, pay a fine as expiation for human life, compensate for murder.
data.sentence: The word بِالْوَادِ comes from the root و د ي and is associated with the meanings: to pay the blood money, pay a fine as expiation for human life, compensate for murder.

data.meanings: Make a hole in a thing, rend or tear a thing, perforate/pierce/bore, to cut a thing, hollow a thing out, traverse or cross, cut through by journeying, penetrate, reply or answer or respond, illuminate and render clear, to shield.
data.sentence: The word جَابُوا comes from the root ج و ب and is associated with the meanings: Make a hole in a thing, rend or tear a thing, perforate/pierce/bore, to cut a thing, hollow a thing out, traverse or cross, cut through by journeying, penetrate, reply or answer or respond, illuminate and render clear, to shield.
The word الصَّخْرَ comes from the root ص خ ر and is associated with the meanings: to be rocky (place). sakhr - rock
